items.label: Error
items.value: Exploratory validation blocked: Insufficient evidence to validate the requirement regarding loyalty access.

items.label: Assessment
items.value: The exploratory step requires validation that loyalty customers receive earlier access (30 days vs 7 days). However, the evidence provided does not confirm this specific behavior; it only indicates that bookings have been made without detailing the access timelines for loyalty customers. The linked use case mentions the requirement, but there is no direct evidence in the prior steps to confirm that this functionality is implemented or functioning as required.
